relevant_findings.skin: Erythematous pseudovesicular papules and arcuate plaques in photodistributed areas of the upper aspect of her back, shoulders, back of her forearms, knees, upper aspect of thighs, and malar cheeks. 1- to 4-mm petechial papules of the legs.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Grade 3 systolic ejection murmur at the ventricular apex.

relevant_findings.nodular_lesions: Numerous nodular lesions present on arms and thighs, some isolated on breast and back. Physical examination otherwise unremarkable.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Nodules persisted, new ones appeared, and deep atrophic scars developed on them.
